row.process:
:SET &CHECK_AGENT_NAME# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&UC4RB_PV_AGENT#,"EXT:") :IF &CHECK_AGENT_NAME# EQ "N" : IF &UC4RB_PV_AGENT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PV_AGENT# = STR_CAT(";name=", &UC4RB_PV_AGENT#) : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &CHECK_AE_SYSTEM# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&UC4RB_PV_AE_SYSTEM#,"EXT:") :IF &CHECK_AE_SYSTEM# EQ "N" : IF &UC4RB_PV_AE_SYSTEM# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PV_AE_SYSTEM# = "system=&UC4RB_PV_AE_SYSTEM#;") : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_PV_AE_CP# = "" :SET &CHECK_AE_HOST# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&UC4RB_PV_AE_HOST#,"EXT:") :IF &CHECK_AE_HOST# EQ "N" : SET &CHECK_AE_PORT# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&UC4RB_PV_AE_PORT#,"EXT:") : IF &CHECK_AE_PORT# EQ "N" : IF &UC4RB_PV_AE_HOST# <> "" : IF &UC4RB_PV_AE_PORT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PV_AE_CP# = "cp=&UC4RB_PV_AE_HOST#:&UC4RB_PV_AE_PORT#;" : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
:PSET &UC4RB_PV_AGENT_RUNTIME_INI# = &UC4RB_PV_AE_SYSTEM#&UC4RB_PV_AE_CP#&UC4RB_PV_AGENT_DEFINITION_INI#&UC4RB_PV_AGENT#
